title: Drawing, "Mountain Range", ca. 1856
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on gray paper
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at top left next to blossoming plant: faint purple; and at top right next to stem with blossoms:  Golden rod
description:
Recto: Horizontal view of a blossoming plant at top row left; a thistle at center; a stem of Golden Rod with blossoms at right; a bough and a plant at bottom left.
Verso: Oblique view of a mountain range.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Mountain Range", ca. 1856.
ca. 1856. Graphite, brush and white gouache on gray paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-36-c.
